Msg_UpdateNote: Note: Users updating from versions below 3.5 must re-run setupOCR to ensure proper functionality.
Lbl_ShowIconSignal: Show Icon Signal When Start OCR
Lbl_ExcludeRegionsDesc: Select areas to exclude from OCR (e.g., UI elements, menus)
Msg_ExcludeRegionAdded: Exclude region added. It will not be visible during translation.
Lbl_AutoMergeOverlappingText: Auto merge overlapping text when translation is longer
Lbl_MicrosoftApiKeyQuickstart: Microsoft API Key (legacy) - optional (press Enter to save):
Msg_MicrosoftLegacyQuickstartNote: Note: Microsoft legacy translator may require a legacy signature key in Settings if enabled.
Msg_ServerGuide1: This feature allows you to create a local hotspot server. The server is responsible for displaying translated text retrieved from the RSTGameTranslation app. You can access the server from any device within the LAN network.
Msg_ServerGuide2: This feature allows you to use your phone as a screen to view translations, which is useful for people who do not use multiple monitors.
Msg_CreateProfileGuide: To create a new profile, enter the profile name in the 'Profile Name' field and click the 'Create Profile' button.
Msg_ProfileNameNote: Important: Profile name must be unaccented characters and no spaces, for example: GodOfWar, GTAV, TheLastOfUs, etc
Msg_RemoveProfileGuide: To remove a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Remove Profile' button.
Msg_UpdateProfileGuide: To update a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Update Profile' button. This will update all current configs in settings to the profile you choose.
Msg_LoadProfileGuide: To load a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Load Profile' button. This will apply all configurations from the selected profile to your current settings.
Tip_ExcludeCharName: The application will automatically exclude character's name in the dialogue. The required format is <character name>: <dialogue>
Msg_RoboticVoicesGuide: To install robotic language voices, go to Settings > Time & language > Speech > Add voices. Select the language you want, click the Add button then wait for the voice to be added to the system. After that, reset the RstGameTranslation application to display the new voices.
Msg_NaturalVoicesStep3: 3. Natural voices will appear in the combo box above marked with (SAPI), while robotic voices will be marked with (UWP).
Msg_NaturalVoicesStep4: 4. For voice languages not available in the list, please select the Multilingual voices in the combo box. These voices can speak multiple languages in addition to their main language.
Msg_Disclaimer: This application is provided as-is without warranty. Please report any bugs through the GitHub repository or Discord.
Msg_SupportAuthor: If you find RST useful and would like to support development, you can buy the author a coffee â€” thank you!

ChatBoxOptions_Tip_AutoClear: Auto Clear Chatbox History When Received New Translated Text
ChatBoxOptions_Tip_AutoClearTimeout: Clear chatbox if no new text appears after this many seconds
ChatBoxOptions_Tip_RecreateOnShow: If enabled, a new ChatBox window is created each time you open ChatBox; when disabled, the same window is reused.

ChatBox_Btn_Mode_Tooltip: Toggle between showing both languages or only the translate/source text
Msg_ConfirmRemovePhrase: Are you sure you want to remove the phrase '{0}'?
Msg_MultiSelectionGuide:
When this feature is enabled, you can select multiple areas to translate by clicking the SelectArea button

Each selection corresponds to one translation area

To switch between translation areas, press ALT+number (number from 1 to 5)

The numbers correspond to the areas you have created; the first selected area is 1, and it increases up to 5
Msg_ConfirmRemoveServer: Are you sure you want to remove this hotspot server?
Msg_AutoOCRDisabled: If you disable this feature, the application will not automatically translate text. To trigger translation of the selected area, click the Start button (default ALT+G). To clear the overlay and get a new translation, click the Stop button (default ALT+G)
TranslationAreaSelector_Instruction: Select translation region: Drag the mouse to select the area you want to translate
Msg_LanguagePackInstallGuide:
Language pack is not installed.

To install the corresponding language pack, please follow these steps:

Step 1: Press "Windows + S" button, type "language settings" and press Enter button.

Step 2: Click on "Add a language" button.

Step 3: Type "{0}" to search.

Step 4: Click "Next" button, uncheck all option and click "install".

Wait for language package install complete and retry

Connection Error: AI server not running at {0}

Have you been click SetupServer button yet (only need to do this once during initial setup)?

If you have not been run, please click the SetupServer button, wait for finish and try again.

Some fix you can try:

1. Click StopServer button to stop server then Click StartServer button to start server
2. Close and reopen application

Tip_WhisperRuntime: CPU: Default, works on all systems. CUDA: NVIDIA GPU acceleration. Vulkan: GPU acceleration for AMD/NVIDIA/Intel.
Tip_VolumeThreshold: Volume threshold to detect voice (0.001-0.1). Lower = more sensitive.
Tip_SilenceDuration: Milliseconds of silence before processing audio (100-2000).
Tip_MaxBufferSamples: Maximum seconds of audio to buffer (1-10). Higher = longer phrases captured.
Tip_WhisperThreadCount: Number of CPU threads for Whisper processing. 0 = auto (use all cores). Lower = less CPU usage but slower.
Msg_WhisperServiceRunning: Local Whisper service is running. Please stop it before changing the audio processing model.
Msg_WhisperRuntimeChangeRequiresRestart: Changing the Whisper runtime (CPU/GPU) requires restarting the application to take effect. Do you want to save this change?
Tip_AudioModelDownload_Part2: . You can download models directly and place them in the RSTGameTranslation/AudioModel folder
Tip_EnableClipboardTranslate: When enabled, text copied to clipboard will be automatically translated
Tip_ClipboardCopyResult: Automatically copy translated text back to clipboard
NotificationMessage_ClipboardTranslated: Translation has been copied to clipboard.
Need_Help_Or_Support: Need help or support? Join our Discord community!
Quickstart_Welcome_Desc: This quick start guide will help you set up the essential features to start translating games.
Quickstart_Welcome_Step1: Select an area on your screen containing text to translate
Quickstart_Welcome_Step2: OCR technology recognizes the text in the selected area
Quickstart_Welcome_Step3: The text is translated using your selected translation service
Quickstart_Welcome_Step4: The translated text is displayed on your screen (overlay) or on chatbox
Quickstart_Welcome_Configure: This guide will help you configure:
Quickstart_Welcome_Configure1: Language settings for source and target languages
Quickstart_Language_Desc: Select the source language (the language in your game) and the target language (the language you want to translate to).
Quickstart_Language_Note: Note: You can change these settings later in the Settings menu -> Language tab
Quickstart_OCR_Desc: Select an OCR (Optical Character Recognition) method to recognize text in your games.
Quickstart_OCR_Desc2: For advanced OCR methods (EasyOCR, PaddleOCR, RapidOCR), you'll need to install and start the OCR server. This can be done through the SetupOCR button on the main screen or button Setup OCR server below after completing this guide.
Quickstart_OCR_Windows_Pros: Pros: Built-in, no additional setup required, works well for most Latin scripts
Quickstart_OCR_Windows_Cons: Cons: May be less accurate for some Asian languages. Requires installing the corresponding language pack in Windows
Quickstart_OCR_Windows_Rec: Recommendation: Best choice for beginners or if you don't have a dedicated GPU
Quickstart_OCR_OneOCR_Pros: Pros: Built-in, no additional setup required, works well for most Language. Better Windows OCR
Quickstart_OCR_OneOCR_Cons: Cons: May be less accurate for some Asian languages.
Quickstart_OCR_OneOCR_Rec: Recommendation: Best choice for beginners or if you don't have a dedicated GPU
Quickstart_OCR_RapidOCR_Pros: Pros: Good accuracy for Chinese, Japanese, and English language. It is inferior to PaddleOCR for other languages. Support all GPUs, including iGPU
Quickstart_OCR_RapidOCR_Cons: Cons: Requires additional setup, more resource-intensive, slower than Windows OCR without GPU. Consumes GPU resources (5-10%)
Quickstart_OCR_EasyOCR_Pros: Pros: Good accuracy for many languages, supports GPU acceleration
Quickstart_OCR_EasyOCR_Cons: Cons: Requires additional setup, slower than Windows OCR without GPU. Consumes a lot of GPU resources (20-30%)
Quickstart_OCR_EasyOCR_Rec: Recommendation: NVIDIA RTX 4000 series and below
Quickstart_OCR_PaddleOCR_Pros: Pros: High accuracy with many languages
Quickstart_OCR_PaddleOCR_Cons: Cons: Requires additional setup, more resource-intensive. Consumes a lot of GPU resources (5-15%)
Quickstart_OCR_PaddleOCR_Rec: Recommendation: NVIDIA RTX 2000 series and above
Quickstart_Translation_Desc: Select a translation service to translate the recognized text.
Quickstart_Translation_GoogleKey: Google Translate API Key (optional, After entering the API key, press Enter to save):
Quickstart_Translation_GoogleKeyNote: Note: Google Translate works without an API key, but using one provides better service.
Quickstart_Translation_ChatGPTKey: ChatGPT API Key (After entering the API key, press Enter to save):
Quickstart_Translation_ChatGPTNote: Note: ChatGPT provides high-quality translations but requires an API key with payment method.
Quickstart_Translation_GeminiKey: Gemini API Key (After entering the API key, press Enter to save):
Quickstart_Translation_GeminiNote: Note: Gemini provides good translations with a free tier available.
Quickstart_Translation_GroqKey: Groq API Key (After entering the API key, press Enter to save):
Quickstart_Translation_GroqNote: Note: Groq provides good translations with a free tier available.
Quickstart_Translation_MistralNote: Note: Mistral provides efficient translations but requires an API key.
Quickstart_Translation_OllamaNote: Note: Ollama runs locally on your PC and doesn't require internet access, but needs good hardware.
Quickstart_Translation_LMStudioNote: Note: LM Studio runs locally on your PC and doesn't require internet access, but needs good hardware.
Quickstart_Translation_Speed: Speed: The translation speed depends on the LLM model, try different models to find the most suitable one.
Quickstart_Translation_Beginner: For beginners: Google Translate (free, no setup required)
Quickstart_Translation_Quality: For best quality: ChatGPT (requires paid API key)
Quickstart_Translation_Offline: For offline use: Ollama, LM Studio (requires local installation)
Quickstart_Translation_Balance: For balance of quality/cost: Gemini, Groq, Mistral (free tier available)
Quickstart_Complete_Review: If you want to review this setup, click the quick setup button on the main screen
Quickstart_Complete_Success: You've successfully configured the basic settings for RST Game Translation. Your changes will be saved after you click the finish button.
Quickstart_Complete_Summary: Here's a summary of your settings:
Quickstart_Complete_Step1Desc: Click the "Select Area" button in the main window to choose the area of your screen containing text to translate.
Quickstart_Complete_Step2Desc: Click the "Start" button to begin the translation process. The translation is in real time.
Quickstart_Complete_Step3Desc: Click the "Chat Box" button to view your translation history and manage translated text.
Quickstart_Complete_Step4Desc: Click the "Overlay" button to display the translation over the original text position on the screen.
Quickstart_Complete_HelpDesc: Join our Discord community for support, tips, and to connect with other users.
